replies.body:
Sorry to be an asshole.

But fan art doesn't belong in "Story, Art & Sound".

The Community Guidelines have made this very clear.

Post something similar to this in "Concepts & Creations" next time.
This is he official concept art. Not the fanart.

> [{quoted}](name=Grau,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=9A6NRJxr,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2018-06-28T14:13:49.918+0000)
>
> This is he official concept art. Not the fanart.

Well feel free to disregard whatever I just said.

Actually this is NOT the concept art! 

This is thumbs for the splash art.  

 Different job, different person.   (David Ko)
How big is Aatrox in lore?

Going by the size we seen on the teaser trailer, I made an image to show a comparison...

https://preview.ibb.co/ipCejo/Aatrox_Size.png
I suspect his exact size varies wildly, since he seems to use the bodies of those he kills/comes across to alter his form (at least that is what I got out of his lore).

I know that you meant well, and I know that usually the fan based stuff or stuff that you, yourself make would have to be posted in **Concepts & Creations** but the reason as to why I posted this here is because (the guy above also stated the reason), because this is the official concept images behind the creation of the official splashart that was created by numerous people.

B and D remind me of:

https://static.comicvine.com/uploads/original/12/127594/4194708-3536502185-img-1.gif

And I like it.
I'm waiting for the people who'll say "too bad that what we got in the end in-game looks like a plastic doll for kids boooo Riot worst rework not my Aatrox bring old one back".
He went from fire breathing monster to edgy demon man real quick.
C B definitely isn’t inspired by Devil man
So they had a idea to make him a giant.

Well, he's still huge when standing near a human, and in Ult form he's even bigger. 
They probably didn't make him into a real giant because everytime there's a champion that size, there are bound to be issues with him, for example, Galio. Galio is colossal, literaly, yet he taunts Sion in a way that makes us think Sion is the same size as Galio, while Sion is somewhat bigger then a normal human, but not in the same way as Galio.
The same problem rises with Cho'gath and Malphite.

Galio is colossal, literaly, yet he taunts Sion in a way that makes us think Sion is the same size as Galio, while Sion is somewhat bigger then a normal human, but not in the same way as Galio.
> The same problem rises with Cho'gath and Malphite.

I feel like the whole galio V sion thing is probably more of galio WANTING someone like that, as if he had an immortal magic buddy, then both of them would just fight forever. Either that, or sion appeared in a lot of the same battles as (statue/unawakened) galio.

True, but there are still Cho'gath and Malphite, who are SERIOUSLY BIG and in-game they seem kinda normal.
The same is with Aurelion Sol and others. 
Aatrox is still big, and still can turn bigger with his ult, but he's not a giant because they can't really express what it's like being a giant in-game.
